def_cn: （各自发表不同观点的）辩论，争论，讨论
def_en: A debate is a discussion about a subject on which people have different views.

def_cn: (议会或其他机构就某问题在投票前进行的)辩论
def_en: A debate is a formal discussion, for example in a parliament or institution, in which people express different opinions about a particular subject and then vote on it.
If people debate a topic, they discuss it fairly formally, putting forward different views. You can also say that one person debates a topic with another person.
If you debate whether to do something or what to do, you think or talk about possible courses of action before deciding exactly what you are going to do.

def_cn: 存在争论的;有待讨论的;未确定的
def_en: If you say that a matter is open to debate, you mean that people have different opinions about it, or it has not yet been firmly decided.
